Home.Title: WELCOME TO
Home.Content: Established since 02/2019, By 09/2022 we have ISO 9001-2015 certification and quality and safety certification for products.
Home.Box1Content: Produced from 100% natural coconut shell charcoal and pressed into pellets, without adding fire oil and other additives such as: sawdust, lime stone…
Home.Box2Content: Easy to burn, hotter, longer heat radiation, cleaner than other wood charcoal according to traditional methods.
Home.Box3Content: Packaged in attractive packaging and suitable for many purposes, not sticky charcoal dust, hard and unbreakable if normally bumped…
Home.Company: Cao Nguyen Binh Phuoc Import Export Co., Ltd.
Home.Intro: Is a company that produces and trades clean coconut shell charcoal. We focus on developing clean, environmentally friendly products. We are committed to bringing to the market products that meet the quality as announced.
Home.EstablishedContent: Established since 02/2019, By 09/2022 we have ISO 9001-2015 certification and quality and safety certification for products. Currently, with a production capacity of 15 tons of finished products/ day, we can meet the needs of customers in the fastest time.
Home.ProductContent: Coconut shell charcoal is a product that is suitable for environmental friendly trends compared to other traditional charcoals to serve human needs. Charcoal is used for shisha, BBQ grilling, heating. No harmful chemicals are emitted when used, no smoke, ideal ash content 2%, long burning, no smell, not self-extinguishing, can be used indoors… those are the advantages that make coconut shell charcoal increasingly popular.With a compact business scale, applying advanced technology, using economical raw materials in a closed production process, we create products that ensure quality and reasonable prices. Confident with competitive advantages in the market.
Home.ProductContent2: With a compact business scale, applying advanced technology, using economical raw materials in a closed production process, we create products that ensure quality and reasonable prices. Confident with competitive advantages in the market.
Home.SmellFreeContent: Does not smell on food when grilling
Home.SmokeFreeContent: Does not create smoke that causes discomfort to the respiratory system
Home.TemperatureContent: White charcoal has high calorific value, fast cooking food, helps increase flavor
Home.ConcentrationContent: Natural bright gray ash color, ash mass only 2% of the total burning charcoal mass. The ash remains the same shape as the charcoal. No dust is blown around, making it easy to clean
Home.BurnTimeContent: Burning time >3h for BBQ charcoal and > 2h for other types of charcoal (3 times that of natural wood charcoal)
Home.HealthProtectContent: Coconut shell charcoal is the raw material of activated charcoal that is applied in many areas of life such as: water filtration, exhaust gas, odor removal, dentistry, cosmetics, medicine…
Home.EnvironmentFriendlyContent: The main ingredient of coconut shell charcoal is coconut shell after using rice and fiber, the production process only mixes food additives, no chemicals and especially does not harm any tree…
Home.Pride: Proud to be the only company in Vietnam with a factory scale, capacity and consumption volume</br>Reaching one container of finished products/day to meet the most demanding markets
Home.PrideMobile: Proud to be the only company in Vietnam with a factory scale, capacity and consumption volume Reaching one container of finished products/day to meet the most demanding markets

Our-Intro.IntroBold: Cao Nguyên Bình Phước Import-Export Co., Ltd.
Our-Intro.Intro1: Founded on 27/02/2019, Business Registration No: 3801195652 issued by the Department of Planning and Investment of Bình Phước. Charter capital of 10.5 billion VND.
Our-Intro.Intro2: The company is located at: Thuận Hòa 2 Hamlet, Thuận Lợi Commune, Đồng Phú District, Bình Phước Province, covering an area of 11,000 m², conveniently situated on Provincial Road 741 for easy access.
Our-Intro.Intro3: We utilize the abundant local resource in Vietnam, dry coconut shells, to produce coconut shell charcoal—a natural fuel with excellent heat generation capabilities and no harmful gases that affect human health.
Our-Intro.Intro4: The production process for COCONUT SHELL CHARCOAL is very strict, from sourcing raw materials to carbonization and activation using various physical and chemical agents with modern technology. The charcoal is produced in an oxygen-limited environment, which eliminates harmful smoke and odors, making it a superior fuel compared to other fuels.
Our-Intro.Intro5Bold: Coconut shell charcoal is highly favored on the market for its advantages:
Our-Intro.Intro6Bold: Smoke-free, High and Even Heat Output
Our-Intro.Intro14: Our products have been certified by | “ISO 9001-2015”, “Quacert”, “Vinacontrol” for safe sea transport and non-toxic chemicals.
Our-Intro.Intro15: With the mission “Clean products for a green life,” we are committed to providing the market with high-quality products as promised.
Our-Intro.Product1: Coconut shell charcoal is produced from the main material—dry coconut shells, carbonized in an oxygen-limited environment to eliminate smoke. This agricultural by-product does not contribute to deforestation but is a highly efficient energy source that does not contain harmful gases.
Our-Intro.Product2: The product is also suitable for indoor use due to its superior characteristics: smoke-free, odorless, low ash content, no chemicals, quick ignition, long burn time, high and even heat output, and affordable price.
Our-Intro.Product3: Using Coconut Shell Charcoal is not only cost-effective (3.5 times longer burning than regular charcoal), clean, and safe for use in enclosed spaces, but also helps create a greener environment.
Our-Intro.Product4Bold: Our products are registered under the trademarks: “Tche Tchello,” “Dahab,” “Coco Zero,” “Coco Sha,” “Highland Cool.”
Our-Intro.Structure1: Our coconut shell charcoal factory is located in Thuận Hòa Hamlet, Thuận Lợi Commune, Đồng Phú District, Bình Phước Province, and officially began operations in April 2020.
Our-Intro.Structure2: The company operates as a two-member LLC, with the Chairman of the Members' Council holding decision-making authority.
Our-Intro.Structure3: The leadership team consists of 02 members, 06 middle management members, and the rest are direct labor personnel.
Our-Intro.Infrastructure1: Covering nearly 2 hectares, our factory operates a closed production line with a production capacity of 15 tons per day.
Our-Intro.Infrastructure8: Additionally, we provide housing for workers who require it to maintain a stable workforce.
Our-Intro.Infrastructure9: In line with our “Green” initiative, the factory uses a solar energy system to reduce heat and utilize renewable energy. Vegetable gardens and fruit trees are also planted to provide a green working environment.
Our-Intro.Material1: The raw material for our factory is DRY COCONUT SHELLS, which are carbonized in an oxygen-limited environment to eliminate smoke. The abundant local supply of coconut shells in Vietnam helps us maintain production levels, ensuring a high proportion of locally sourced materials and boosting our competitive advantage.

Our-Cer.Commit1: – To our customers: Provide and meet the needs of customers with the best product quality and services. Be a reliable and effective choice for customers.
Our-Cer.Commit2: – To our shareholders: Build and implement effective and sustainable business plans.
Our-Cer.Commit3: – To our employees: Create and continuously improve a professional working environment, providing opportunities for employees to build their careers with the company.
Our-Cer.Commit4: Below are some product testing results conducted by the Quality Measurement Center.

Cashew.Title: SALTED ROASTED CASHEW
Cashew.Title1: HighlandBP’s Salted Roasted Cashew originates from Binh Phuoc Province, famous for producing the best and most delicious cashews in the country, also exported abroad. Using advanced technology, each cashew is coated with a layer of salt to enhance the natural sweetness and rich, nutty flavor, stimulating the taste buds for more deliciousness.
Cashew.Title2: Cashews are economically valuable due to their nutritional content. They contain the three main nutrients that provide energy for the body: protein, carbohydrates, and fat. In addition, cashews also contain essential nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, and powerful antioxidants.
Cashew.Title3: Currently, coconut shell charcoal is known as the best charcoal for BBQ grilling in restaurants, BBQ shops, or for home use.
Cashew.Box1Content: Cashews contain proanthocyanidins – a type of flavanol shown to prevent cancer cells from reproducing and eliminate cancer cells.
Cashew.Box2Content: Cashews are rich in copper, a crucial component of tyrosinase. This enzyme helps convert tyrosine into melanin, which creates pigments in hair and skin.
Cashew.Box3Content: Cashews are rich in oleic acid. This monounsaturated fat helps improve cardiovascular health and reduces triglyceride levels. Additionally, magnesium in cashews may help lower blood pressure and prevent heart attacks. Coronary artery disease and cardiovascular risk can be reduced by regularly eating cashews, as they contain no cholesterol and antioxidants.
Cashew.Box4Content: People who eat cashews twice a week tend to avoid obesity. About 75% of the fat in cashews is unsaturated fat – a healthy fat for the body.
Cashew.Box5Content: Cashews also contain magnesium, which works with calcium to regenerate the bone structure. Additionally, copper in cashews provides flexibility to bones and joints.
Cashew.Box6Content: Not only good for bones, but the magnesium in cashews also benefits the nervous system and muscles. Magnesium helps relax blood vessels and muscles by slowing the flow of calcium into nerve cells.
Cashew.Box6Content2: Research shows that magnesium helps reduce the frequency of migraine attacks, lowers blood pressure, and helps prevent heart attacks. Conversely, magnesium deficiency in the body can cause high blood pressure, muscle tension, and fatigue.
Cashew.Box7Content: Cashews can help increase oxygen to the brain. Cashews play an important role in improving memory. This is because they are rich in both polyunsaturated and monounsaturated fats – two types of fats that impact brain cell production. The great thing is that cashews are high in both of these fats.
Cashew.RM1: Enhances the health of the nervous system, muscles, bones, and teeth
Cashew.RM2: Reduces the risk of diabetes, kidney stones, anemia
Cashew.RM3: Prevents cancers such as lung cancer, colon cancer, prostate cancer, pancreatic cancer, etc.
Cashew.RM4: Supports weight management and helps regain a slim body
Cashew.RM5: Good for eyes, improves skin, and strengthens hair
Cashew.RM7: Our ancestors used to say, “Too much of anything is not good,” and this applies to both food and cashews. To maximize the benefits of cashews and avoid negative health effects, experts recommend eating no more than 30 grams (about 15 nuts) per day.
Cashew.RM8: To keep cashews fresh for a long time, store them in a sealed container in a cool place, avoid humidity, and odor. Use within 1 month after opening the package.

Coconut.Title: COCONUT FRUIT
Coconut.Title1: HighlandBP’s Coconut Fruit originates from Ben Tre (Convenient Coconut), widely used as a preferred beverage and commonly used in food preparation, such as making caramel sauce or marinating braised meat to enhance flavor...
Coconut.Title2: Coconuts are carefully selected, choosing large and heavy coconuts harvested at the right time, with a process of preparation and storage that avoids the use of chemicals.
Coconut.Box1Content: Drinking coconut water helps reduce digestive issues, alleviates mouth ulcers, and quickly restores the body after dehydration.
Coconut.Box2Content: People suffering from frequent urination and other urinary problems should drink more coconut water to relieve symptoms.
Coconut.Box3Content: Regular consumption of coconut water helps the body resist viruses, bacteria, intestinal worms, parasites, and other digestive infections in both children and adults.
Coconut.Box4Content: Drinking coconut water regularly can be quite effective in regulating blood pressure due to its high levels of potassium and lauric acid.
Coconut.Box5Content: Coconut water contains lauric acid that can reduce skin cell aging, balance the skin’s pH, and strengthen connective skin tissues, keeping the skin hydrated.
Coconut.Box6Content: If you are trying to lose weight, coconut water is one of the best beverages you can drink.
Coconut.Box7Content: Due to its abundant vitamins, minerals, and nutrients, coconut water is an excellent energy-boosting drink.
Coconut.Box8Content: Coconut water helps balance muscle health, cardiovascular health, the nervous system, and the immune system, as well as absorb and balance bodily fluids.

Contact.Content: Cao Nguyen Binh Phuoc Export-Import Co., Ltd. always pays attention to every step in the production process from the very first stages, aiming to completely eliminate any substandard products, especially during the raw material screening phase.
